channel.title: Projects on Ishan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ishan's Blog

item.title: How I created a search engine for Wikipedia articles
item.description: It is said that the best way to learn a new software technology is to get your hands dirty. Recently I followed this advice when I was learning to be a search engineer. I found myself getting more and more interested in learning how search engines like google and product search engines like Amazon search work. I started learning about information retrieval theory and gradually moved on to practical technologies like Apache Lucene and Apache Solr.
